name: disjxwrdOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))

stmt.origin: invdisjrab(s0, s1, c0, cword(c1), co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s0, co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffsc(s0, csubstr)
-| diffsc(s0, cop(nat0, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ d(s0,(s1[substr]< 0, c2 >))
⊣ d(s0, s1)
⊣ d(s0, substr)
⊣ d(s0, < 0, c2 >)

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffsc(s0, csubstr)
-| diffsc(s0, cop(nat0, c2))

|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))
-| diffsc(s0, csubstr)
-| diffsc(s0, cop(nat0, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, { s1 ∈ Word(c1)|(s1[substr]< 0, c2 >)= s0 })
⊣ d(s0, s1)
⊣ d(s1, Word(c1))
⊣ d(s0, substr)
⊣ d(s0, < 0, c2 >)

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))
-| diffsc(s0, cop(nat0, c2))

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s0, cop(nat0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, nat0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))
-| diffsc(s0, nat0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, cword(c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

|- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ disjwrdpfx as of 12-Oct-2022. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 7-May-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
